text:
The message field in LoggingEvent is private and is not accessible.

I believe this is a bug, since when you write your own appenders you need to 
extract the message from LoggingEvent in the append(LoggingEvent event) method 
of AppenderSkeleton.
creator: veerappan@integral.com
bugzilla@apache.org
text: Have you looked at the new LoggingEvent.getMessage method? Ceki
